  • Method Details

    • removeById

      public boolean removeById​(int id) throws ServiceException, RemoteException
      Remove Product with id from data-storage. This remove operation also removes Stock entities, if needed. Access to data-storage obtained via DAOProvider. In case, DAOProvider implements AdvancedProductDAO, this implementation will use cascadeRemoveByID. Otherwise, naive implantation via BasicDAO provided.
      Specified by:
      removeById in interface BasicService<Product>
      Overrides:
      removeById in class BasicServiceImpl<Product>
      Parameters:
      id - Identifier of entity, that will be removed. See Identifiable
      Returns:
      true in case, that entity was successfully removed, false otherwise.
      Throws:
      ServiceException - thrown in case, of same logical errors.
      RemoteException - thrown in case of some connection errors.
      See Also:
      BasicDAO
